common.selectFile: Select a config file to understand how your AI agents work.

ecosystem.title: üöÄ GitHub Copilot Ecosystem
ecosystem.intro: Welcome to the **Modern Vue 3 Boilerplate**. This project is specifically designed to work harmoniously with AI agents. The configuration inside the `.github/` folder is the "brain" that guides GitHub Copilot to write code exactly how we want.
ecosystem.agentsDesc:
Custom AI personalities focused on specific domains.
- **Vue Helper**: Your general architect. Use him for planning and big-picture tasks.
- **Component Generator**: A precision tool for creating Atomic UI components with testing.
ecosystem.skillsDesc:
Technical "knowledge packs" that teach the AI how we handle specific tasks.
- **Vue Best Practices**: Teaches performance, state management, and anti-patterns.
- **Component Generation**: Defines the exact structure and testing strategy for UI code.
ecosystem.instructionsDesc: The project's "bible". It contains the coding standards, naming conventions, and architectural rules that the AI must follow at all times.
ecosystem.promptsDesc: Pre-defined templates for common tasks. Instead of typing a long prompt, you can use these to quickly generate stores, pages, or refactor code.
ecosystem.tip: **Tip:** Select any file from the sidebar to inspect its configuration and understand how to interact with your AI agents.

about.title: About This Boilerplate
about.structureDesc: This Vue 3 boilerplate is designed to help you quickly start new projects with best practices already configured. It includes:
about.viteDesc: Next-generation build tool for fast development
about.copilotDesc: This boilerplate includes special configurations for GitHub Copilot:
about.copilotAgents: Custom AI agents for Vue development
